Title: Blue's Big Mystery
Plot: There's somebody building a fort in the backyard of the Blue's Clues house, but we have no idea who it is. In this episode, we put on our detective caps and logical-thinking skills. There's a mystery to be solved. Come along as we investigate, with a little help from Mr. Salt and all of our friends.
GuestStars: Ralph DiPasquale, Dorothey Jane Washington Green, Kenny Kim, Jesse Regina, Nicky Regina, Valerie Cosgriff
